name: Bo
description: Lemon Lip's Mom. She seems to be good friends with Raggedy Anne. I met Bo and Lemon Lips in 2012. No distinguishing marks except for a slight white spot on the front of her dorsal. Very friendly, seems to like it when Lemon Lips swims with me. Maybe gives her a rest! B.B.Tip and Raggedy Anne will swim close to me when all of them are together. Bo seems to want me in the pod.
